item.title: Damage Waiver
item.description: <p>A new comic! It’s a Christmas miracle! Also, the first comic drawn entirely on the iPad Pro with the Apple Pencil in Procreate. Here’s a <a href="https://youtu.be/ULxUMh4CHis">process video</a>, if you are interested.</p>
item.content:encoded: <p>A new comic! It’s a Christmas miracle! Also, the first comic drawn entirely on the iPad Pro with the Apple Pencil in Procreate. Here’s a <a href="https://youtu.be/ULxUMh4CHis">process video</a>, if you are interested.</p>
